title: Adorable pictures of celebs dressing their kids in super cute Halloween outfits
text:
If you're in need of some Halloween inspiration this year, see how the stars have dressed up their kids in these cute costumes

It's Halloween, where the stars pull out all of the stops on their kids' costumes.

Whether they're out trick or treating or joining their parents on the red carpet at a Halloween bash, these celebs have it covered.

From Gwyneth Paltrow and her daughter Apple's spooky skeletons to Jimmy Fallon's adorable daughter Winne in a chicken costume, here are some of the best celebrity kids Halloween costumes...
description: If you're in need of some Halloween inspiration this year, see how the stars have dressed up their kids in these cute costumes
